Buttons

  • A <button> doesn't need anything special to work. ARIA's role="button" is already assigned natively.
  • If you are using a link as a button, add the role="button" attribute.
  • Add class="visuallyhidden" with descriptive text to give more context to the button's purpose.

Guidelines

Guideline 1.1 - Text Alternatives: Provide text alternatives for any non-text content so that it can be changed into other forms people need, such as large print, braille, speech, symbols or simpler language.

If non-text content is pure decoration, is used only for visual formatting, or is not presented to users, then it does not need text alternatives.
